WHD010.label: Current self-reported height (inches)
WHD010.text: These next questions ask about {your/SP's} height and weight at different times in {your/his/her} life. How tall {are you/is SP} without shoes?
WHD010.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

WHD020.label: Current self-reported weight (pounds)
WHD020.text: How much {do you/does SP} weigh without clothes or shoes?
WHD020.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

WHD050.label: Self-reported weight - 1 yr ago (pounds)
WHD050.text: How much did {you/SP} weigh a year ago?
WHD050.target: Both males and females 16 YEARS - 150 YEARS

WHD140.label: Self-reported greatest weight (pounds)
WHD140.text: Up to the present time, what is the most {you have/SP has} ever weighed?
WHD140.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

WHQ150.label: Age when heaviest weight
WHQ150.text: How old {were you/was SP} then? [If you don't know {your/his/her} exact age, please make your best guess.]
WHQ150.target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS
